EmailTemplate.name: 11-10-21 HOS prospects Campaign Newsletter.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Are you utilizing lessons-learned checklists?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Restaurant Operations: Lessons from a Project Manager Creating a list of lessons learned is a common, and important step at the end of each project no matter which industry you’re in. It saves you and your organization time and money and builds credibility. Whether you currently utilize “lessons learned” checklists, there are some best practices to abide by. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Share on  <[[https://urldefense.com/v3/__https:/www.facebook.com/283156830259/posts/10160100288375260__;!!In4Qlw!88Yz8t5B6rbIh8NBxnyyYSf7c_JdYo4AVtp9_VFoE7myzH8ulP_ttdZVuERMabqjfw$]]>  <[[https://urldefense.com/v3/__https:/twitter.com/NCRCorporation/status/1443301527557480451__;!!In4Qlw!88Yz8t5B6rbIh8NBxnyyYSf7c_JdYo4AVtp9_VFoE7myzH8ulP_ttdZVuETd7NTmPw$]]>   <[[https://urldefense.com/v3/__https:/www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:6849066819538452481/__;!!In4Qlw!88Yz8t5B6rbIh8NBxnyyYSf7c_JdYo4AVtp9_VFoE7myzH8ulP_ttdZVuERAiNzAcA$]]> Adding It Up Restaurant owners and operators continually evolve to keep up with payment trends. But understanding how payment processing works and what to look for can get tricky. Consider this five-step analysis <[[https://www.ncr.com/restaurants/adding-it-up-hospitality-e-book]]> on what to consider before choosing a payments processor. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Customer Wins: Blu Jam Cafe “Breakfast should never be boring” is the defining aspiration at Blu Jam Cafe in Hollywood. Investing in digital ordering and contactless dine-in is an extension of that mindset. The venue’s NCR POS had already been capturing usable information. It just needed to be harnessed. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Share on  <[[https://www.facebook.com/283156830259/posts/10159981435020260]]>  <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation/status/1420038734041518087]]>   <[[https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:6825803756328771584/]]> ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
